MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA2 postcode area of Paisley. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45am to carry out repairs to faulty electrical equipment at Oliphant Oval and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.38am on Wednesday 23rd December 2020.
